Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 27th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1965...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1969, off Frank Funk (CLE)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/1969, off Gary Peters (DET)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1969, hitting .316 with 6 HR, 78 RBI...
Injured on 7/11/1972 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
